title: Liam Hemsworth rebuilds LA home next door to ex-wife Miley Cyrus and Cody Simpson’s pad
text:

Liam Hemsworth has been rebuilding the home he used to share with Miley Cyrus after the devastating LA fires burned it to the ground last year.

The swanky pad is awkwardly on the same Malibu street as ex-wife Miley Cyrus’ love pad she now shares with her new beau Cody Simpson, 22.

The Hunger Games star, 29, and his ex were left devastated when their lavish $6.8million Malibu home burned down in the California wildfires last November.

After purchasing the property from Miley in 2014 when they were going through a 'break', Liam has now obtained an excavation permit and plans to restore the luxury home with extreme renovations.

(Image: Google Maps)

Liam's estate is just a stone's throw from away from the cool ranch Miley now shares with new Australian beau Cody.

The former Disney star, 26, purchased the $2.5million seventies-inspired ranch back in April 2016, and confirmed that her hunky boyfriend Cody moved in earlier this month.

Miley returned to her ranch after the two first split and Liam temporarily returned to Australia. However, it seems having his ex down the street isn't enough to deter Liam from renovating his dream home.

Cody marked the special moment he moved in with Miley with a sweet Instagram snap, writing: "move in day".

(Image: Miley Cyrus/Instagram)

(Image: PA)

The two popstars started dating just weeks after Miley's very public split from Kaitlynn Carter .

Miley's blossoming romance with the hunky surfer comes after her two-month relationship with Kaitlynn and divorce from handsome actor Liam Hemsworth after one year of marriage was announced.

Liam first spoke out about the devastating affects of the Californian wildfires last November.

Returning to the site at the time, Liam said he was shocked to find giant letters spelling out 'Love' lying scorched in the ashes.

(Image: Instagram)

Sharing the harrowing picture on Instagram, he wrote: "It’s been a heartbreaking few days. This is what’s left of my house. Love. Many people in Malibu and surrounding areas in California have lost their homes also and my heart goes out to everyone who was affected by these fires.

"I spent the day in Malibu yesterday and it was amazing to see the community pulling together to help each other out in any way they can. Malibu is a strong community and this event is only going to make it stronger.

(Image: Instagram)

"Thankful for the all the great local guys that helped keep smaller fires out around my property. I love u guys. I love you Malibu.

"Thank you to all the hero firefighters around California. It’s going to be a journey to rebuild. Stay strong all. To help/donate visit @malibufoundation and @happyhippiefdn"

The Woolsey fire destroyed the homes of many celebrities, including Gerard Butler and Robin Thicke, who also visited the sites where their houses once stood.
description: The home that Liam Hemsworth is rebuilding is next door to his estranged wife Miley Cyrus and her new boyfriend Cody Simpson
